hi...my name's Rose and i would like to talk to someone!!....Bye

man it has been an exciting week! well....about a couple weeks be4 we got out of school, me and my older sis went down to the schools with a friend...well we got bored and started doing dares..one of them was to go in a small puddle...lol....but then, i found a puddle about 6 ft long and wide!! so...i dared my sis to go in it! haha...well she did on her bike and she went in this one area which was about 2 feet deep!! lol..then i got the idea that we should run through it! well we did and got soaked from toes to waist!..but it was fun...then one night we ate about 5 popsicles! haha that was fun....and now im talking to my older sis's friend, nick, and im realllyyy bored! haha...did any one watch mad tv sat. night??? it was sooo funnyy! ~rose

man there is this stuuupid kid at my school and he gets me soooo mad!......school is almost out!!!!!!!....yaahoooo....have u seen cheaper by the dozen? i think its funny when that one dude says.....they set me on FIYRE!!!...haha.....well i g2g....chat to me at coltfilly5 (AIM)

yes!! its workin,, its workin....im soo happy! man i never type long blogs on here...dunno y tho...oh well so yeah just as a told u i dont leave long posts unless something exciting has happened....well yesterday it got to about 110 degrees out side of our house! inside it was like 80 degrees...i was sweatin and i was just sitin there! how crazy is that?...p.s. please leave a comment about my blogs
